tic_tac_toe.title: Your Turn: Vocabulary
tic_tac_toe.directions: Match each word to the sentence it completes. If you are correct, place your X on the board by clicking a square. Three spaces in a row wins.

item.text: A(n) [benefactor] bought new books for the school library.
Our [indecision] made us late to the movie.
The fire caused [extensive] damage to the forest.
There is a(n) [multitude] of stars in the night sky.
I can’t wait to meet the [celebrity]chef.
I always [endeavor] to do my best work.
I [tentatively]signed up for an after-school art class.
The colors were [permanent] and bright.
It is good to know how to [communicate] in many languages.
Everyone [contributed] ideas for the name of the class pet.
Balloons[expand]when they are filled with air.
The big, friendly dog [frightened] the little baby.
We had to[inform] the post office about our new address.
You need a fishing [license] to fish at the lake.
The ball made a hole in the window [pane].
You could drive through a tunnel in the [massive] tree.
Ivan was [startled] by the sudden, loud noise.
We shook hands with every member of the [rival] team.
I was happy with the teacher’s positive [remark] about my work.
The [injury] was very minor.
I learned a lot during the class [discussion]about reptiles.
The crowds caused a [commotion] at the skating rink.
I made a [budget]to save money for a new game.
Magnets [attach] papers to the refrigerator.
